renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)    mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                // rotation                  
                       
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,h,c,k; 
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -3.5*R.y) - R),             // ray direction
          p = 12./R, q,d,                                     // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5: vec3(20,8,0)/1e2*cos(iTime+vec3(0,11,0)); // auto thumbnail
     
    for (O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01)
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(.5-6.*M.y),                               // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(2.-6.*M.x), q.y++,
        t = min(t, h = q.y), q.y++,                           // water
        q.xz = abs(q.xz),                                     // 2 symmetries
        
        d = q, d.y-=3.,                                       // sails
        d.yz *= rot(-.3),
        d.xz *= rot(-.3),
        t = min(t, max( abs(d.z),- 1.55-d.y ) ),
 
        d = q, d.y-=1.1,d.yz *= rot(.8), c= d.z,              // body, front+rear
        d = q,
        d.yz *= rot(.4),
        d.xz *= rot(-.3),
        t = min(t, max( max(abs(k=d.z),c), d.y-2.04) ),
        d = q, d.y-=1.07,d.yz *= rot(.8),                     // body, center
        t = min(t, max(abs(d.z),k) ),
       
        p += .5*t*D;                                          // step forward = dist to obj          

    O *=   t==h ? vec4(.0,.5,1,1)   // water                  // color scheme
         :        vec4(1);          // boat
}
renderpass.name: Image
